page.title: 03LIFE AND CONCERNS IN CAPEL
page.content: THIS AREA IS CLOSELY CONNECTED WITH FIVE OAK GREEN WHERE MOST OF THE 2000 PEOPLE LIVE AND WITH WHOM THERE IS A STRONG SENSE OF COMMUNITY. WHEN NEW ESTATES WERE BUILT IN THE LATE SIXTIES THERE WAS INITIALLY A GULF BETWEEN "OLD"AND"NEW"VILLAGERS WHICH HAS SINCE CLOSED AND ALL ENJOY THE IMPROVED AMENITIES. A LONG STANDING PROBLEM HAS BEEN THE WIDE DISTRIBUTION OF THE 3 ANGLICAN CHURCHES. RECENTLY ST.LUKE'S HAS JOINED IN COVENANT WITH THE U.R.C. TUDELEY,WITH ITS CHAGALL WINDOWS NOW A TOURIST MECCA, HAS MAINTAINED A WEEKLY TRADITIONAL 11A.M.SERVICE AND CAPEL NOW HOLDS ONLY 2 SERVICES EACH YEAR. {SUBJECTS OF CONCERN}= LIMITED AND DEAR BUS SERVICES,TOO MANY CONTINENTAL CONTAINER LORRIES THUNDERING ALONG THE B2017,INCREASED HOUSE BREAKING, LOCAL GRAVEL EXTRACTION AND FARMING CHANGES CAUSED BY E.E.C. MARKET CONTROLS.
